title: spec: Variable Declarations, incorrect variable type
body:
In the **Variable Declarations** section of the Language specification:

http://golang.org/ref/spec#Variable_declarations

The last code block contains this line:

    var d = math.Sin(0.5)  // d is int64

Here `d` will be of type `float64` not `int64` as mentioned in the comment.

Example code printing type of `d`: http://play.golang.org/p/1XHnoLJKq-
